title: A.J. Green Injury Implications, Zeke’s Holdout, and Training Camp With the Packers, Browns, and More | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Jon Gruden is talking up Nathan Peterman, A.J. Green requires ankle surgery, and Jerry Jones speaks on the value of running backs (0:50). Then, takeaways from training camp with the Packers, Browns, Vikings, Bills, Bears, Colts, Steelers, Jets, and Giants (15:15).
Hosts: Robert Mays, Kevin Clark
